text: Do not be anxious about your life... Look at the birds of the air... your heavenly Father feeds them.
question: Why do you think Jesus points to God’s care for creation to ease our worries? How might this truth apply to your situation?

text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want...
question: How does knowing God is with you as a shepherd comfort you in your loneliness?

text: You make known to me the path of life; in your presence there is fullness of joy...
question: What does it mean to find fullness of joy in God’s presence today?

text: For God so loved the world that he gave his only Son...
question: How does God’s love in this verse shape your view of your current challenges?
